sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description/> <name>Set default enable exact match to true</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var glideRecord = new GlideRecord("sys_search_context_config"); glideRecord.addQuery("search_engine", "ai_search"); glideRecord.query(); while (glideRecord.next()) { glideRecord.enable_exact_match = true; glideRecord.update(); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-03-29 21:31:28</sys_created_on> <sys_id>08b91047733121105afea11cff148bab</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Set default enable exact match to true</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Text Search API" source="com.glide.search">c93878203cf1311068bcf327dfe37f61</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_08b91047733121105afea11cff148bab</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-03-29 21:46:44</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Set default enable exact match to true
